languages.text: "Прекратить любые "расследования" за моей спиной. Еще раз услышу о таком, арбитр — отправишься вон с судна, и не через шаттл, а через шлюз".

traits.locale_text: "Соломон, кем ты себя возомнил? На этом корабле я — закон. И я запрещаю тебе проводить здесь расследования".

languages.text: "Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."
languages.original_text: "Прекратить любые "расследования" за моей спиной. Еще раз услышу о таком, арбитр — отправишься вон с судна, и не через шаттл, а через шлюз".

traits.locale_text: "Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."
"Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."
"Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."
"Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."
"Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}が知らないところでの『調査』は全部やめろ。もう一度そんな話を耳にしたら、アービトレイター、君はこの船から放り出されることになるぞ。シャトルじゃなく、エアロックからな」
languages.original_text: "Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}が知らないところでの『調査』は全部やめろ。もう一度そんな話を耳にしたら、アービトレイター、君はこの船から放り出されることになるぞ。シャトルじゃなく、エアロックからな」

languages.text: "Benden habersiz yürüttüğün tüm soruşturmaları sonlandır. Bir kez daha böyle bir şey duyarsam bu gemiden atılırsın Yargıcı. Hem de bir mekikle değil, doğrudan hava kilidinden."
languages.original_text: "Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."

traits.locale_text: "Benden habersiz yürüttüğün tüm soruşturmaları sonlandır. Bir kez daha böyle bir şey duyarsam bu gemiden atılırsın Yargıcı. Hem de bir mekikle değil, doğrudan hava kilidinden.

languages.text: «Déjese de "investigaciones" a mis espaldas. Arbitrator, si me entero de que esto se repite, tendrá que abandonar inmediatamente mi nave. Por la esclusa más cercana».
languages.original_text: "Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."

traits.locale_text: «Déjese de "investigaciones" a mis espaldas. Arbitrator, si me entero de que esto se repite, tendrá que abandonar inmediatamente mi nave. Por la esclusa más cercana».

languages.text: “以后不准再背着我搞什么‘调查’。要是再让我听说这种事情，法务官，你就从我这艘船上出去吧——不是坐穿梭机下去，是从气闸出去。”
languages.original_text: "Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."

traits.locale_text: “以后不准再背着我搞什么‘调查’。要是再让我听说这种事情，法务官，你就从我这艘船上出去吧——不是坐穿梭机下去，是从气闸出去。”

languages.text: « Cessez de mener de telles "enquêtes" dans mon dos. Si j'ai de nouveau vent d'une telle histoire, Arbitrator, je vous expulserai de mon vaisseau, non pas à bord d'une navette, mais directement par le premier sas venu. »
languages.original_text: "Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."

traits.locale_text: « Cessez de mener de telles "enquêtes" dans mon dos. Si j'ai de nouveau vent d'une telle histoire, Arbitrator, je vous expulserai de mon vaisseau, non pas à bord d'une navette, mais directement par le premier sas venu. »

languages.text: "Ihr werdet sämtliche "Ermittlungen" hinter meinem Rücken einstellen. Und sollte sich der Vorfall wiederholen, verlasst Ihr das Schiff, Arbitrator ... allerdings nicht mit einem Shuttle, sondern durch die Luftschleuse."
languages.original_text: "Cease any 'investigations' behind my back. If I hear of such a thing again, Arbitrator, you will be put off this ship — and not via shuttle, but through the airlock."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet sämtliche "Ermittlungen" hinter meinem Rücken einstellen. Und sollte sich der Vorfall wiederholen, verlasst Ihr das Schiff, Arbitrator ... allerdings nicht mit einem Shuttle, sondern durch die Luftschleuse."
